Facebook’s stock took a major hit Wednesday after a disappointing earnings report, causing the company’s value to fall a staggering $120 billion in just two hours.
This comes amid times of controversy inside Facebook, including the Cambridge Analytica scandal that exposed the private information of millions of its users.
The social media network’s founder, Mark Zuckerberg, took a financial hit of $17 billion.
